title: Shanghai Disneyland coronavirus scare leaves thousands trapped
content:
1. Shanghai Disneyland coronavirus scare leaves thousands trapped  The Washington Post
  2. Shanghai's Halloween Lockdown Becomes a Disney Nightmare as 30000 Are Detained in Theme Park Virus Scare  The Daily Beast
  3. COVID-19 scare forces Shanghai Disney into lockdown after woman tests positive l ABC7  ABC7
  4. Nearly 34,000 people were locked down at Shanghai Disney Resort, mass tested for COVID-19  USA TODAY
  5. China Locks 30,000 Visitors Inside Shanghai Disneyland After One Guest Got Covid-19  The Wall Street Journal
